name: DroneDailyNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Staying up to date in the sUAS / drone industry on a daily basis. You get the top story of the day from Macatawa Unmanned Systems, a leader in sUAS operations. From drone news in the public sector, private sector, to what's new in the government drone procurement is all given here on a daily basis.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
